FuncDef: This command creates a context to configure match criteria for a network QoS policy match IPv6 criteria. When the match criteria have been satisfied, the action associated with the match criteria is executed.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the next header to match. Values-protocol numbers accepted in decimal, hexadecimal, or binary: 0 to 42, 45 to 49, 52 to 59, 61 to 255.
